items.content_html: This is a simple, lightweight, and flexible routing library for React applications. It provides a set of components and hooks to handle routing in your application, including support for dynamic routes with path parameters.

items.content_html: A library for managing and communicating events in your application through a singleton pattern. This pattern ensures that there is a single instance of the event manager, making it easy to coordinate and handle events across different parts of your codebase.
